title: Shing-Tung Yau
summary: Shing-Tung Yau (/jaʊ/; Chinese: 丘成桐; pinyin: Qiū Chéngtóng; born April 4, 1949) is a Chinese-American mathematician and the William Caspar Graustein Professor of Mathematics at Harvard University.[1] In April 2022, Yau announced retirement from Harvard to become Chair Professor of mathematics at Tsinghua University.[2]
